hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOWE.EOWE_ID, EOWE.CREATOR, EOWE.CREATE_TIME, EOWE.MODIFIER, EOWE.MODIFY_TIME, EOWE.REC_VER, EOWE.REC_STATUS, EOWE.ORG_ID, EOWE.EOWE_WORK_NO, EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_CODE AS EOWE_MODULE_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_NAME AS EOWE_MODULE_NAME, EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_TYPE_CODE AS EOWE_MODULE_TYPE_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_TYPE_NAME AS EOWE_MODULE_TYPE_NAME, EOEF.EOEF_TAB_SEQUENCE AS EOWE_TAB_SEQUENCE, EOEF.EOEF_TAB_CODE AS EOWE_TAB_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_TAB_NAME AS EOWE_TAB_NAME, EOEF.EOEF_TAB_NAME_EN AS EOWE_TAB_NAME_EN, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_ROW AS EOWE_FIELD_ROW, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_COLUMN AS EOWE_FIELD_COLUMN, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_CODE AS EOWE_FIELD_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_NAME AS EOWE_FIELD_NAME, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_NAME_EN AS EOWE_FIELD_NAME_EN, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_TYPE_CODE AS EOWE_FIELD_TYPE_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_TYPE_NAME AS EOWE_FIELD_TYPE_NAME, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_PARAMETER AS EOWE_FIELD_PARAMETER, NVL(EOWE.EOWE_ACCESS_CODE,EOEF.EOEF_ACCESS_CODE) AS EOWE_ACCESS_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_REQUIRE AS EOWE_REQUIRE, EOEF.EOEF_MODIFIED AS EOWE_MODIFIED, NVL(EOWE.EOWE_VALUE_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_DEFAULT_VALUE) AS EOWE_VALUE_CODE, EOWE.EOWE_VALUE_NAME FROM EO_EXTENSION_FIELD EOEF LEFT JOIN EO_WORK_EXTENSION EOWE ON EOWE.ORG_ID = EOEF.ORG_ID AND EOWE.EOWE_MODULE_CODE = EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_CODE AND EOWE.EOWE_MODULE_TYPE_CODE =EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_TYPE_CODE AND EOWE.EOWE_TAB_CODE = EOEF.EOEF_TAB_CODE AND EOWE.EOWE_FIELD_CODE=EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_CODE <<AND EOWE.EOWE_WORK_NO LIKE :eoweWorkNo>> WHERE EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_CODE = 'EO_WORK_EXTENSION' <<AND EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_TYPE_CODE LIKE :eoefModuleTypeCode>> <<AND EOEF.ORG_ID =:orgId>>
